document.full_text: a minnesota lawmaker is asking state senate leaders to allow only nondenominational prayers to open sessions, after a baptist pastor repeatedly mentioned jesus and christianity in an invocation.
document.title: midwest: minnesota: lawmaker wants jesus out of invocations
lines_and_colors: a minnesota lawmaker is asking state senate leaders to allow only nondenominational prayers to open sessions, after a baptist pastor repeatedly mentioned jesus and christianity in an invocation.
